document.full_text: bahrain lifted martial law on wednesday in what the government hopes will be a sign to tourists and business of a return to normal, but the opposition fears repression will continue in the gulf island kingdom.
document.title: bahrain lifts emergency law, military trials press on
lines_and_colors: bahrain lifted martial law on wednesday in what the government hopes will be a sign to tourists and business of a return to normal, but the opposition fears repression will continue in the gulf island kingdom.
